body.name: 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside, 1080P Dash Camera for Cars, Dashcam Three Way Triple Car Camera with IR Night Vision, Loop Recording, G-Sensor, 24 Hours Recording, Support 128 GB Max
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 44 mins
features: 【Three Channel Dash Cam for All-Round Protection】M2 dashcam built with a triple channel system, offer 165°Front camera, 160°Cabin Inside the camera, and 160°rear camera. Simultaneously captures video from the front, rear, and cabin of your car as vital evidence for dispute or accident.

【1080P Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside with HD Display】High performance Novatek chipset and Sony Sensor, help deliver smooth 1080P front video + 720P cabin inside video + 720P rear video. 3 Channel Videos are displayed on the IPS screen giving you live time video feedback of 3 sides of your car.

【Dashcam with Super Night Vision & IR Cabin Light】Thanks to f/1.8 big aperture & WDR (wide dynamic range) technology, the M2 car camera performs well in color precision and clarity whether day or night. 4 IR Light face to the cabin, accurately capture the driver and passengers even when the cabin is completely dark, ideal for rideshare drivers such as Uber, Lyft, and Taxi.

【Auto Save the Collision Footage and Loop Recording】Built in Gravity-Shock Sensor, then the dash cam detects a collision or bump happens, the sensor will auto-lock the footage as evidence(protected files). The Loop recording function can overwrite the oldest unprotected files when the SD card is about full.

【Evidence for collisions, theft, and vicious scratch happening after your car is parked.】Parking Monitor: When the dash cam detects a collision happens, it will auto power on then record a protected video (doesn’t need a hardwire kit). 24 Hours recording: the dashcam will go on recording after your car is parked (need connect to hardwire kit, buy extra ASIN B09SPN811C).

【Dash Camera for Cars with Hidden Design & Easy to Install】Unique compact designed car camera, M2 dash camera for cars combine three cameras with a tiny size. Won't shade your view or distract you whilst driving. With simplified rear camera installation, no need to remove the reversing light, just connect it with the front lens and it can be used.

【2024 Updated Firmware: Support 128 GB Memory Disk】NOTE: SD card is not included in this package. We have updated the M2 dash cam firmware and it can support 128 GB memory disk now! You can store 2 times videos than before, and 4 times than other normal 3 channel sysytem on amazon(they can only support 32GB Max). Recommend buying extra ASIN B07KNTXKL3.

【Worry-Free After-sale Service】Every customer is fully covered by a one-year warranty. We provide 7*24 technical support-respond within 12 hours. You can Email our customer care and we will answer any of your questions and resolve arising issues fast. If you're having any doubts, it comes with a FULL REFUND within 30 DAYS.

I want the camera go on recording even when the car is off, do I need to hardwire kit? Yes, to achieve the 24 hours recording function, your need to connect the camera with hardwire kit ASIN (B09SPN811C) and select the ‘Time Lapse Recording’ function ON from the dash cam. Do I need to purchase SD card separately for this camera? Yes, the SD card is not included in this camera, we recommend you purchase a Class 10 U3 Micro SD card, for 128 GB Max, recommend Amazon ASIN: B07KNTXKL3. Does this camera record 3 camera (front, rear and inside) together? Yes, the videos from front, rear and inside camera are recording simultaneously, and you can see the videos from 3 lens from the camera display also. Is the installation complicated? Shall I give it to a fix-up store install instead? The installation is quite simple and the package came with the tool you need from the installation, you can watch the installation videos from the user manual then install it. Can I remove the camera from my car and install it in my other car easily? Yes you can as this camera is using suction stand, you can easily disassemble it from your windscreen, while other camera using glue stand may lose stickiness and cannot stick again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great & reasonably priced
reviews.reviewText: This is my first dash cam, and I decided to invest in one after someone ran into me and totaled my last vehicle. I only set up the front dash cam (not the rear one which I felt was a bit much for me). The dash cam set up was super easy! I almost went to Best Buy to have them install it and I’m glad I didn’t because it would have been a waste of money.It’s been awesome having this and I consider it to be essential at this point with the way people drive. Recording starts as soon as my car turns on and I love that it’s simultaneously recording a wide range of the road AND recording inside my vehicle. I haven’t had any issues with the suction on the mount however the camera has slipped out of the slider piece that’s connected to the suctioned mount a few times - no biggie, I just make sure the camera is sitting securely in the holder every few days so it doesn’t happen again. Camera is super clear at night too. I’m thankful to have this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Surprised At The Quality
reviews.reviewText: First time getting a dashcam. Did a lot of research and decided to try the low-cost versions first. I expected to have the video not clear and maybe an issue with the recording, or just something. Installed this on an Audi A6, which took some effort to get the rear cam cable ran. Then just run the power cable from the outlet, under the dash, up the A-pillar, and across the front of the headliner until it gets to the camera. Still not bad at all for install, and setup was easier than that! I let it run for a few days and check the card to see what errors and quality level there is. All three cameras record clearer than I even thought possible, given their sizes. I was even surprised at the audio quality. That reminded myself to not be weird in the car anymore. I'm only irritated about the short videos being individual "files", but that's only because I suck with technology. I've now had this over a year and it still runs flawless. The ONLY negative about this whole system is the slot for the suction cup on the top of the camera loosens up in southern hot summers. That causes the whole camera set to fall off onto the dash, or wherever the cables permit. It dropped a few times and now the inside camera is jacked up. Absolutely my fault for not supergluing it after the first time. About to buy it again, this time supergluing that slot before I even suction to the windshield.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent camera, excellent value
reviews.reviewText: This dashcam worked fine during my test run, which included both day and night, all three cameras, and testing out voice pickup. I would rate this dashcam 5 stars based on the price: it's an excellent value. Setup was simply, and directions were clear. Daytime picture quality was very good, while night time was fairly good. It does have an option to adjust brightness, which is great for night. I will say that the picture quality is not as good as a smart phone, but to be honest, from what I've seen, even expensive dash cams don't have an better picture quality. This dash cam picture quality is good enough though, and serves the purpose of providing a clear picture of what happened. I will say that the mic quality is not that great, as it picks up the noise of the car, making it difficult, but not impossible, to pick up voices (I tested speaking). Speaking is clearly heard up to 45 mph, but gets a little more difficult at higher speeds. Granted, my car is noisy. Overall, a good value, and a good option for a dashcam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Records fine and works as it should.
reviews.reviewText: I had no trouble with this camera. Does it’s job with no problems and install was easy. This was connected to the cigarette lighter and on the window. Quality is 1080. I’ve only used the front and cabin camera. Each camera records separate files on the sd card. The only bad thing I don’t like is the mic quality. You literally can not hear someone talk and only hear loud screeching. So this camera is excellent for visual but not to record videos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought two dashcams because ppl suck at driving (me). The first one I bought was an over the mirror digital display by Pelsee and it was GREAT. Sadly though, I have to angel the mirror downwards to get a good view of the front but then I can’t use it as a regular rear view because it has to be readjusted. If your way taller than 5’3 and own a sedan, those type of cameras might workout for you. This camera was my second purchase and I love it too! I LOVE that the angel is wide and can be adjusted, I LOVE that it is tiny and doesn’t obstruct the view of my rear view mirror. I wish the car port offered a usb port so that I could still use my phone charger. But anyways, this camera is great and though the screen is small, you can still see and even change format to view interior of car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok for the money
reviews.reviewText: This is a good value dashcam. The install is easy and the directions are good and complete. Overall the construction quality is good. But the problem is the picture quality is not that good and that is probably what separates this budget version from more expensive models.Note: This dashcam is not shipped with a memory card you have to get that separately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to set up
reviews.reviewText: This camera is great! It records the front of your vehicle through the windshield and the interior at the same time. You can also set up a camera that shows behind your vehicle. It records video and audio to a SD card in up to 5 minute loops. Once the SD card is full it will automatically over right the oldest video. If you want to save a video it’s easy to lock that video in so it won’t be erased. Super easy to operate. Definitely recommend this camera
It’s a great tool to use for front and rear activities.

I haven’t yet hooked it up to my car. It was delivered in such a timely manner and, there was quite the list of instructions. When I hook it up I will edit my review and let everyone know how the video and sound quality is.

reviews.reviewTitle: Haven't try this one yet will see if it will last one your
reviews.reviewText: All the other ones didn't last a year
Camera works great! I love it and the customer service by WhatsApp is very slow but they will finally help you! Thank you and I really recommend it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Stuck in back up mode will no change to all 3 cameras
reviews.reviewText: Go with Something Else.On the 31st day the camera went into back up mode and stuck there. Unplugged the back up camera and the other two cameras work fine. Plug it back in and only back up with big STOP letters. Who wants to uninstall this whole thing to return it. It takes lots of work in installContacted customer service many times no answer. Past return time.
